tags.name: accent-card
tags.description:
`accent-card`

Attributes:

  * `accent-background` {`boolean`} - Apply accent color to card background

  * `accent-heading` {`boolean`} - Apply accent color to heading

  * `flat` {`boolean`} - Display the card as flat (no box shadow);

  * `horizontal` {`boolean`} - Display the card as a horizontal layout? Default is vertical.

  * `image-align` {`string`} - "Optional": The horizontal alignment of the image, so that:
- "left" will align the left edge of the image.
- "right" will align the right edge of the image.
- "center" will align the center of the image
- A null will allow temporary support to the deprecated CSS variables

  * `image-src` {`string`} - "Optional": The source for an image on the card

  * `image-valign` {`string`} - "Optional": The vertical alignment of the image, so that:
- "top" will align the top of edge of the image.
- "bottom" will align the bottom edge of the image.
- "center" will align the middle of the image.
- A null will allow temporary support to the deprecated CSS variables

  * `no-border` {`boolean`} - Removes the think accent border

Properties:

  * `accentBackground` {`boolean`} - Apply accent color to card background

  * `accentHeading` {`boolean`} - Apply accent color to heading

  * `flat` {`boolean`} - Display the card as flat (no box shadow);

  * `horizontal` {`boolean`} - Display the card as a horizontal layout? Default is vertical.

  * `imageAlign` {`string`} - "Optional": The horizontal alignment of the image, so that:
- "left" will align the left edge of the image.
- "right" will align the right edge of the image.
- "center" will align the center of the image
- A null will allow temporary support to the deprecated CSS variables

  * `imageSrc` {`string`} - "Optional": The source for an image on the card

  * `imageValign` {`string`} - "Optional": The vertical alignment of the image, so that:
- "top" will align the top of edge of the image.
- "bottom" will align the bottom edge of the image.
- "center" will align the middle of the image.
- A null will allow temporary support to the deprecated CSS variables

  * `noBorder` {`boolean`} - Removes the think accent border

attributes.description:

Property: accentBackground

Default: false
